title: Life Model
description:
It’s terrifying enough modeling for an art class in the city.

Then my professor walks in.

I’ve wanted my art professor since the day I met him. He’s so calm, so assured, so stern.But he’s only ever been distant. Polite and professional. That all changes the minute I drop my white robe.We shouldn’t be here. He shouldn’t see me like this.But I don’t turn back.And neither does he.
Life Model is a short and steamy age gap instalove story, starring an art professor who is OBSESSED with his talented student.
author: Cassie Mint
